Wait, let me reconsider the action format. The preset shows "Look LEFT: heading=355.0" which means rotating left will give me 355°. Let me calculate: from 85° to 355° going left (counterclockwise) is 85° - 355° = -270° or equivalently +90° won't work. The difference is 355 - 85 = 270° clockwise, or -90° counterclockwise...
